item.title: Can Language Models Learn to Skip Steps?
item.description: Language models learn to skip steps in reasoning, improving efficiency and generalization, showcasing emergent human-like cognitive abilities.

item.title: Learning Neural Contracting Dynamics: Extended Linearization and Global Guarantees
item.description: ELCD: The first neural network guaranteeing globally contracting dynamics!

item.title: Reversing the Forget-Retain Objectives: An Efficient LLM Unlearning Framework from Logit Difference
item.description: Reverse the forget-retain objectives for efficient LLM unlearning!

item.title: Stochastic Zeroth-Order Optimization under Strongly Convexity and Lipschitz Hessian: Minimax Sample Complexity
item.description: Stochastic zeroth-order optimization of strongly convex functions with Lipschitz Hessian achieves optimal sample complexity, as proven by matching upper and lower bounds with a novel two-stage algorit…
